name: Ghoster! (Gloostão)
description:
A Marcão, the god, devotional game, a game dev from our team that is missed from the map. If someone found Marcão, let he knows that the game is finally published.

Charlão Pavão is a cientist. A Ghost is kidnapped from Rio de Janeiro. Charlão's  objective is capture ectoplasm, and for this he needs some horror objects like Xuxa's CD and Fofão's Head (and a lot of other horror objects) to make the ghost give more ectoplasm.

[The game was made in old game maker]

[Press F to Fullscream, and take care with de high volume at the begining]

The team:

Programmer - Victor

Artist - Joner

Marcão - Marcão

Programmer - Jaime
